survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Plant-Based Restaurants
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their dining experience at plant-based restaurants to improve service quality and menu offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you dine at plant-based restaurants?
